function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Overcrowding in public areas of multi-story apartment buildings","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission in crowded public areas","Mitigation":"Limit the number of people in public areas, enforce mask-wearing and social distancing","Technologies":"Smart building systems to monitor and control occupancy, ventilation systems for air purification","People":"Residents of multi-story apartment buildings","Owner":"Building management and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Adaptation of living spaces for remote work and study","Impact":"Increased time spent at home leading to reduced opportunities for social interaction","Mitigation":"Encourage virtual social interactions, provide mental health support resources","Technologies":"Virtual meeting platforms, mental health apps and resources","People":"Individuals adapting their living spaces","Owner":"Employers, mental health organizations"},{"Description":"Extended periods at home during quarantine","Impact":"Increased mental health-related issues due to isolation and uncertainty","Mitigation":"Provide access to mental health services and resources, promote virtual social interactions","Technologies":"Telehealth platforms, mental health apps and resources","People":"Individuals quarantining at home","Owner":"Public health authorities, mental health organizations"}]}
